## wrapOnce variable

Like [wrap](./math.wrap.md)<!-- -->, but optimized for cases where `x` is guaranteed to be in `[min - d, max + d]` interval, where `d = max - min`<!-- -->. Result will be in closed `[min..max]` interval.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
wrapOnce: (x: number, min: number, max: number) => number
```
